## Update from Debian8 (Jessie) to Debian9 (Stretch)

```
# sed -i 's/jessie/stretch/g' /etc/apt/sources.list
# apt update
# apt upgrade
# apt dist-upgrade
# reboot
# apt-get autoremove
# apt-get clean
```

## Update from Debian9 (Stretch) to Debian10 (Buster)

```
# sed -i 's/stretch/buster/g' /etc/apt/sources.list
# apt update
# apt upgrade
# apt dist-upgrade
# reboot
# apt-get autoremove
# apt-get clean
```
